ags:resource.dc:title: Economic and mathematical harmonization model of manufacturing and distribution operations of food industry enterprise

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: To harmonize the manufacturing and distribution operations of food industry enterprise, linear programming method in reliance on the simplex method (SM) has been employed. A solution to a problem of minimizing the departure of the output product quantity from the distribution department demands has been suggested. Economic and mathematical model, which has allowed arriving at the best management decision in regard to the panification and bread and flour products manufacturing, has been justified and tested on the data of OJSC "Bread-baking complex".
